backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled CRUD operations for products stored in a map with public query endpoints.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files including components, pages, and utilities.
frontend/.env: Environment variables defining the app name and slug for branding.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining theme variables and light/dark mode tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point bootstrapping the React app with metadata for title and description.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, global layout, and React Query provider.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section component displaying branding info and feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/BrandSection.tsx: Brand-specific product grid component rendering a header and product cards.
frontend/src/components/BrandsSection.ts: Renders a section highlighting featured automotive brands with styled cards for Turtle Wax and 3M.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Displays an alert-style empty state with optional action button.
frontend/src/components/HomeHero.tsx: Provides the homepage hero banner with headline text and a large background image.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Shows a product card with image fallback logic, wishlist/cart actions, pricing, and navigation.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, dynamic year, and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements the responsive site header with navigation, branding, and cart/wishlist counters.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Defines centralized branding values like app name, slug, and tagline.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actors with automatic refetching on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Manages cart state in localStorage with item add, update, remove, and total calculation helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading, login, logout, and identity restoration logic.
Custom hook syncing React state with localStorage for persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useProduct.ts: Fetches a single product by ID using react-query and an actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductMutations.t: Provides create, update, and delete product mutations and invalidates product queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Fetches the full product list via react-query and the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useWishlist.ts: Manages wishlist items in localStorage with add, remove, toggle, and lookup helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom green-yellow theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/pricing.ts: Utility functions for formatting INR amounts and calculating discount percentages.
frontend/src/lib/productImages.ts: Maps known brand-name product pairs to static image paths and retrieves mapped paths.
frontend/src/lib/uploadedProductImages.t: Provides a list of uploaded product images with helpers to list paths and validate them.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and loads the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AllProductsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of all products with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart with quantity controls, item removal, totals, and checkout navigation.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout flow for single-product or cart mode with form validation and order placement.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Fetches products, groups them by brand, and renders hero, brand, and about sections with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/MyProductsPage.tsx: Provides an authenticated product management UI with create, edit, and delete dialogs and form validation.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Loads a product by ID, displays details with fallback images, and supports cart and wishlist actions.
frontend/src/pages/WishlistPage.tsx: Shows wishlist items with image handling and allows moving items to the cart or viewing details.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending typography, colors, animations, and container settings.
